doc.name: NeoPixelLEDStrip
doc.description:
This actor uses three input ports to light up a NeoPixel LED Strip.

The code generator supplies the method contents, thus this class has no methods.
doc.author: Robert Bui
doc.port: The ledIndex input port. If this port is connected, then its input will determine whether an output is produced in any given firing. The type is integer array.
The color input port. If this port is connected, its input will will determine the color of the LEDs. The type is integer array.
The clear input port. If this port is connected, then its input will clear given firing. The type is integer.
